title: General
fullText:
Boats equipped with both a.c. and d.c. electrical systems shall have their distribution on separate switchboards, or, in the case of systems with combined a.c. and d.c. switchboards, the panel shall be designed so that when the panel is open there is no access to energized a.c. parts without the use of tools.
A switchboard shall be installed in a readily accessible location and shall be weatherproof or shall be protected from weather and splash.
